reviews.text: Always an interesting place to visit. Been here many times and it's a good place to take children on a wet and windy day. Not so large and can get busy. Parking on Madeira Drive is possible or further along towards the marina with a nice walk on the promenade. Also nearby to the pier to combine a visit.

Plenty to see here, great for kids. Took 5he grandchildren who loved being so close to all the sea life. Pity about part being closed for works, but I'm sure it will be even better when completed. Will definitely come back when done.

First time going to the sea life centre and I've got to say it wasn't what I was expecting, the pictures used to advertise it made it seem like you see one huge tank with loads of different marina life in it, instead it is loads of separate tanks, I wasn't expecting that. 

There is plenty to see and it does take a while to go around it all, so you would say it is worth going. 
At the front desk they push selling everything to you claiming it is cheaper and will be the "last chance" the back stage pass cost £3 a head which isn't expensive but for what you get, some questions not answered because they don't know full information. 
And it was a little rushed I felt! Don't waste your pennies. 

As expected the cafe is a little more exspenive comparing it to your local add an extra £1/1.5 on top of the drinks... I didn't look at the food as we had eaten before hand. 

It gets very warm in there!! 

Lastly, we have a 1 year old who is still in nappies at the moment. So of course we headed to the baby changing to find they don't even have a room but instead you have two pull down stations outside the toilet area... it might be just me, but I don't feel comfortable changing my daughter's bum in public where everyone can see her little lady parts... 

Anyways don't think I'm just complaining we had a great time there just felt we should let's outs know what we thought so they too know what they are going into.

Their large tank is currently closed as work is being carried out for the new attraction for spring.

The kids loved it anyway, only draw back is that even though we have tickets to return before end of July it takes a lot of planning as we have to travel 2 hours just to get there.

Might be good for children. But for two visiting adults it kinda sucked. I remember going as a child and thinking how amazing it was. But as an adult its pretty small and quite expensive for what youre getting. The underwater tunnel is still cool and will always be but the rest was just slightly underwhelming.

Amazing concert venue. I have been going to this venue for years and I'm always amazed by the ornate detail of this theater. Great space and easy to get in and out of. Great places to grab something to eat and drink nearby as well. Weather it be comedy shows, music or plays, the Palace is a great spot to enjoy.

Beautiful building in downtown Albany. Saw Justin Moore last night.. Pretty clean. Sticky floors but that's what happens when drinks spill. Would definitely go to another show there. I didn't think any seat in the house was a bad seat. We had 10th row. But I also went to back for a breather and those seats weren't bad either.

This theatre is absolutely gorgeous and sounds great. The staff is awesome and concession costs are reasonable with a decent selection of canned craft brews available for $8. I highly recommend seeing any show here.

Attended a concert here with my daughter. Small venue made it seem very personal. I don't believe there was a bad seat in the house! The baroque style 
interior was beautiful. Depending on the band, I would definitely make the four hour drive to return to the Palace Theatre.

I really enjoyed seeing my favorite band at this venue. The architecture in this place is beautiful. The sound is great. The staff was kind.  Seating for the event was first come first sat. I will definitely return for a show in the future.\mm/
Very nice staff and the food was excellent. Didn't take long to arrive and was hot and fresh. Pretty consistent ordering at Pizza Express. There is a takeaway option also if you need to dash.
Very good pizza. Perfect service. I will come back for sure ;).
Such good food! At first it looks like a fast food restaurant but the food is really good quality and tasty!
Good pizza, slow service.
Delicious food. Friendly, helpful staff.

One of the best Pizza Huts in the area. First folks in so the buffet wasn’t completely out yet. Though the food that was, was absolutely delicious & hot. Staff was friendly & on top of things. Restaurant was pretty clean & well organized.
SO so ummy...and I love supporting young readers -- thanks, Hut! ...did I mention how very yummy the pizza was? Seriously. Good pizza 🥰
Love their pizza! It's the best anywhere. The service at this one is amazing, too!
Food was good and so was the service. Waitress was great also!
Pizza hut has been always the best pizza and love the salads and sauces. Great services as well.

Love walking into a Starbucks and smelling the fresh coffee. This location was clean and the staff friendly. Coffee was made to order and correctly made for this picky coffee drinker lol. This spot has an area for when you are wanting to socialize or break out the computer/books and do some studying while sipping on a latte. Only problem I seen was the drive through and parking area are very tight but couldn't take a star away just for that. Keep it up at this location cause my little girl and I will definitely be back for our coffee.
Always fast, friendly, and informative! Their coffee is great and their snacks are always yummy! Mobile pickup through their app is always very convenient as well!

Yummy but prices need to stop going up, they  are beyond being a very successful business that has millions of people addicted and stopping for ine of their many yummy beverages and foods almost every day like its crack, stop being greedy with the cost increase of everything, PLEASE. I want to be able to afford my coffee "crack" lol just playing, kinda. Attention there's no illegal drugs served at any Starbucks facility
... that I'm aware of!
Very friendly service. Got the order correct. Fast.
Rude, impersonal staff, slow service, dirty restrooms. The food is blah, you get better quality food at much lower prices at McDonalds or any of the other fast food chains in the area.
